meanings.sent1: Tommy bellyflopped into the pool with a loud splash.
meanings.sent2: She bellyflopped off the diving board, causing a big wave.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy penguin bellyflopped onto the ice, sliding comically.
meanings.sent4: His hopes of success bellyflopped when he failed the audition.
meanings.sent5: The elephant's massive body bellyflopped into the mud, creating a spectacle.

meanings.definition: A dive in which the body lands flat on the stomach (noun)
meanings.sent1: The bellyflopped diver emerged from the water with a red belly.
meanings.sent2: The lifeguard rushed to help the child who had just bellyflopped.
meanings.sent3: The bellyflopped contestant received sympathy from the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of a perfect dive bellyflopped when she hit the water awkwardly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of a bellyflopped landing echoed across the pool area.
